h3_39: University of Washington School of Medicine
p_65: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_69: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_82: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_100: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_103: Our DR Residency benefits from an outstanding teaching faculty branched out across our city and based at our 6 centers of clinical excellence. Our radiology residents are chosen for their high caliber in academic performance and for recognition of dedication to service, research and leadership. Residents complete core requirements in the first 3 years of radiology training. The final year can include research, teaching, early sub-specialization, or in-depth education in more than 1 field.
